column1: strays on the pads first ball, and is tucked to square leg
gets it straighter, and Shadnam defends
he's off the mark in Test cricket with a sweetly timed boundary to long-off. Full ball on off, driven past the bowler. Didn't try to hit it too hard, but got the timing spot on
length ball outside off, defended off the front foot
length ball outside off, he shoulders arms
back of a length, getting some movement into the left-hander, but he's equal to it, getting behind the ball and defending
starts with a very full ball, slight movement into the left-hander in the air, and he gets a thick inside edge that goes to deep square leg
strays down leg, and Shadman can't get bat on it. Well outside leg stump, a limited-overs wide
that's not bounced back of a length and that has gone at knee roll height through to the keeper, outside off
gets this one to rise up to chest high, but comfortably defended off the back foot, dropping the ball down close to him
full ball, comes forward to drive it firmly, but straight to extra cover
length ball nipping back in, tucked towards short square leg
past the outside edge back of a length outside off and coming in with the angle from around the stumps. Soumya stays inside the line and the ball whistles past the outside edge
beaten again He's challenging him in that corridor, but staying inside the line, though the bat is going a mite further away from body than he'd like
fuller that time, and he pushes it to point's left for a single
back of a length, punched to point
length ball angling into the batsman, rolls off the inside edge towards the bowler
length ball outside off, he moves across and defends it solidly
flighted, on the the stumps, patted down
flighted on off, comes forward to defend, it takes the inside edge and rolls past forward short leg
good length, pitching on leg and spinning a touch across the batsman, defended into the leg side
tossed up, and he comes forward to defend with a big stride
good length and flight again, drawing the batsman on to the front foot to defend
he's found his length and he's plugging at that. Another forward defensive
length ball on the stumps, defended from the crease into the off side
dragged down too short, and it doesn't rise, pulled away with some authority to deep midwicket, but there is a fielder there to clean up
length ball, defended with an angled bat off the front foot. The ball travels to point

short ball, but that one rose higher. Already some signs of uneven bounce on this pitch? A few balls have kept low, this one rose till the shoulders. Negotiated well in the end, pulled it keeping the ball down
length ball outside off, he shoulders arms
length ball on the stumps, that one didn't bounce a lot again. Defended from the crease
comes forward to push this into a gap in the covers
turn already tossed up, landing on the length where he can't quite meet it with a big stride, it grips and turns away from the bat
tossed up, too full, and driven comfortably to long-off
a bit flatter and quicker, he comes forward to defend
beaten nice loop to the ball, drawing him forward and dipping to beat his intended push. Spun between bat and pad
back of a length on the stumps, not rising above the pads again, defended
a bit fuller on off, clipped to mid-on
too full on the pads, and whipped away to deep square leg
airy waft, and beaten. Roach kept it slightly wide of the fourth stump line, and the batsman went for the drive, away from the body. Connects with air
fuller ball on the stumps, driven back to the bowler
given room outside off, he goes down on one knee to square drive it through the in-field
better line, on the stumps and on a length, defended off the front foot
tossed up on the stumps, defended to point with an angled bat
quicker one on the stumps, defended back to the bowler
on a length outside off, comes forward to defend
lets it go through outside off
on a length outside off, defended into the off side
bounces off a length surprised the batsman a bit, rising up above the waist from a good length, but he brought his bat down in defence quickly
nice shot given room outside off and Lewis went too full. It was in the slot and he leaned into the drive. Didn't try to hit it too hard, so the ball was pulled back inside the cover fence
dug in a short one, but the batsman transferred weight back seamlessly and pulled it to deep square leg with good timing
tossed up outside off, draws the forward defense
goes straighter with his line, and the batsman doesn't adjust perfectly to the line but gets an inside edge that rolls away to square leg
turn and bounce again. Forces him to defend off the back foot
tossed up on the stumps, and defended off the front foot that time
touch fuller, allowing the drive, but it goes straight to cover
oooh, turn again and beaten perfect length, pitches and beats the forward defensive to spin past the bat
length ball outside off, shoulders arms to let it through
dug in short outside off, but it's not quick enough though it rises to shoulder height. Allows him to pull it, keeping the ball down, to square leg

pulled with authority, but the fielder at deep midwicket is there. Another short ball outside off, he was on to that one quickly and didn't keep it down. Didn't hit it high enough though, so it goes on the bounce to the man on the boundary
back of a length on the stumps, gets nicely behind the line and defends
stays back to cut this from the stumps past point
strays on the pads, perhaps forced by the shot the previous ball, tucked to square leg
tossed up but too full, driven between point and cover
flatter, back of a length, spinning away from the batsman. Wasn't full enough to come forward to defend
length ball, spinning away, he goes inside his crease and guides it to point
flatter, but on the pads, tucked to square leg comfortably
super shot short ball but given some width outside off, and he cuts it elegantly past point. Didn't move his feet at all, but looked perfectly balanced
on a length, nipping back into the batsman from around the wicket, defended to cover
length ball on off, defended to midwicket from the crease
keeps it fullish and straight, defended from the crease
gorgeous very full outside off and driven so crisply through cover that it you want to have that shot with your morning tea
back of a length on off, stays back and defends with a straight bat
tossed up, fullish on the stumps, defended gently
too full, and driven square past point. Got some room outside off and opened the face of the bat while driving
delicately done length ball that bounced, but he stayed back and cut it past the lone slip
fuller on the stumps, defended
length ball, pitches on middle and leg and some turn, but defended safely
good length, tossed up and turning back into the left-hander. Defended
slightly back of a length, spinning into the batsman again
pitches it fuller, drawing him forward to defend
fullish again, comes forward to defend
he's varying his length, went back to back of a length, but defended comfortably
full ball on off, defended
length ball on leg, patted into the leg side
tossed up, and driven back to the bowler
loose shot and he's got him tossed up, on a length and he draws the false drive that time. The ball grips and spins enough to take the edge and into the waiting hands of the lone slip
length ball outside off, and defended off the back foot towards the off side. Skidding through, this
extra bounce, but Mominul swivels to pull along the ground. Deep midwicket cleans up. Short from Chase, and he did well to ride the bounce
slower through the air. And full on leg stump. Tapped back to Chase
fuller just outside off, and he walks down the ground to crunch a straight drive to long on. They walk across for a single
length ball, spinning into the left-hander, and defended with the horizontal bat
full just outside off, and he takes a big stride to defend
overpitched just outside off, and he shovels a cover drive off the bat's toe end. Rolls away to cover
full on middle, and he shuffles across the stumps to cover his off stump. Defends it towards Mominul
full on off, and he carefully lets the ball come to him. Defends with the bat's straight face
full on leg stump, and clipped off his toes to midwicket. Raises his back leg to try and really get a hold of this delivery, but mistimed eventually
overpitched outside off, and he gets to the pitch of the ball to drive. Mistimed to mid off on this occasion
full on off, and he meets the ball after taking a big stride. Pushed back to the bowler
full just outside off, and he leans forward to smother the ball towards the leg side. Soft hands
full on off stump, and he comes forward to defend it back to the bowler
full just outside off, and he drives gently to long off to walk through for a single. Not the best of timing, but played into the gap
overpitched on off stump, and wedged away off the front foot to point. Played with the angled bat
full on off, and he allows the ball to spin into his bat, before driving down to long on
full on off, and turning into Mominul. Defended away with the straight bat
full on middle, and he shuffles across to flick the ball towards the leg side
full just outside off, and defended back to the bowler
full outside off, and spinning inwards. Pushed towards the non striker
full on middle stump, and he leans forward to tap the ball back to Chase
full on off stump, and defended off the front foot
full just outside off, and defended away to Chase once more
full just outside off, and defended off the front foot
length ball skidding in, and he gets right back to defend off the back foot
length ball on off, and he allows the ball to come to him, before nudging it away - off his pads - to square leg for a run
length ball on middle, and punched off the back foot to cover
full on off, and worked off his toes to the leg side. Soft hands once again
full on middle, and shoveled down the ground to wide long on. They jog across for an easy single
full on his toes, and whipped off his boots to deep backward square. The single brings up Bangladesh's fifty
full on off, and turning into his body. Defended off the front foot
full just outside off, and defended back to the bowler
full on middle stump, and clipped away to square leg off the front foot. Stopped by the fielder
length ball on leg stump, and turning down the leg side. Rocks back to flick behind square, but it takes his pad and rolls towards the keeper. Front foot no ball though!
length ball on middle, and nudged off the back foot past the keeper. Fine leg running to intercept, and they manage to pull it back
back of a length on middle, and defended off the back foot towards Bishoo
full and wide outside off, forcing Shadman to reach at it. He gets to the pitch of the ball, and drills a drive to cover
length ball outside off, and cut off the back foot to the sweeper fielder on the off side. They jog across for a single
length ball on middle, and worked off his pads to deep backward square. Tidy over
length ball on middle, and punched off the back foot to long on
full on middle stump, and driven towards the off side. But it comes off the bat's toe end, and dribbles away to mid off
full on off, and turning into the batsman. He offers the bat's full face, and defends it back to Warrican
length ball on off, and spinning inwards once again. Shuffles onto the back foot to defend
full on middle, and clipped away off his pads to square leg. Fielder intercepts
length ball on off, and nudged off his front foot to square leg
overpitched on off, and it's the wrong'un from Bishoo. Turning away, as he crunches a drive to mid off
full outside off, and driven to mid off
conventional spin, length ball on middle and skidding back. Defended away
length ball on middle, and defended off the back foot to the off side
length ball on middle, and steered with the bat's angled face to point
length ball on middle stump, and punched back to the bowler
full on off, and defended off the front foot to square leg
full on middle stump, and flicked away off his pads to midwicket
full on off stump, and he walks down the ground to defend. Stopped by Warrican
full just outside off, and he thumps a straight drive past the bowler's right to long off
full just outside off, and defended down the ground to Warrican
full on middle, and turned away - off his toes - to square leg. Wants the single, but it's gone straight to midwicket
length ball on leg stump and skidding through. Rocks back, swivels, and pulls to deep midwicket
full on middle stump, and he takes a big stride forward to defend
full on off stump, and defended to mid off
full just outside off, and steered away with the angled bat to Chase at cover
full on off and defended away to mid off. No chance of a run
drift in the air, and full on middle stump. Defended down the ground to mid on
lifted! Full on middle. He gets to the pitch of the ball, and thumps this right over the leg side. Good use of his wrists as the ball races away to the cow-corner boundary
overpitched on middle, and gently flicked to deep midwicket once again
overpitched on leg stump, and defended past the non-striker to short mid on
full on leg stump, and defended towards the leg side. Stopped by short leg
full on leg stump, and defended inside-out to cover
good length on off, and he shuffles onto the back foot to defend
full on middle, and nudged with the bat's open face to point. Easy pickings with third man near the boundary
full on middle stump, and flicked towards the leg side
full on off, and driven gently to Chase at cover. Well fielded, scampering across the ground
length ball on off and skidding through. Defended off the back foot towards point. Looked to cut, but too close to his body, therefore choosing to bunt it away instead
good length on middle, and skidding into the keeper's gloves. Left alone
good length on middle, and punched to mid off off the back foot
length ball on middle, and turning into leg stump. He stays on the back foot, and defends the ball into the ground towards the leg side
full on middle, and defended off the front foot. Right back to Warrican
full outside off, and defended against the turn to cover. Full face of the bat
full on leg stump, and wedged away to mid on. Off the bat's toe end, so couldn't generate any power
good length on off, and nurdled with the spin to deep midwicket. Played off his hips
full on middle, and driven towards the leg side. Off the bat's inside half, and midwicket must run across the ground to intercept
full on off stump, and defended off the back foot. Roach comes steaming in, but much to his dismay, the batsman chooses not to attack
full and wide outside off, and driven away from his body to cover. Falls just short of the fielder there
overpitched just outside off, and driven with the angled bat to cover. Stopped by Hetmyer, and that's forced the batsman to scurry back
full outside off, and he crunches a square drive through the infield! Man in the boundary runs across the ropes the intercept
full just outside off, and defended down the ground to cover

full on middle stump, and that's taken a leading edge over mid off! Tries to muscle it to deep midwicket, but the bat turns early in his hands, and the delivery goes to the off side instead. So close to a wicket
full on leg stump, and he winds up to slog towards the leg side. But the ball stays low, goes under his bat, and even finds its way between the keeper's legs! A couple of byes for Bangladesh
staying low once again! Full outside off, and he backs away to cut. Too close to the body for the shot anyway, and the keeper grabs on to this
full on off, and muscled with the spin to deep midwicket. Flicked away
full outside off, but that hasn't stopped him from cutting the ball. Slapped past point on this occasion
full on off stump, and driven down the ground to long on for a walking single
back of a length outside off, and defended off the back foot. But extra bounce makes him glove the ball
full just outside off, and a bit of swing in the air. Going away from the batsman as he reaches out to defend
length ball just outside off and Shadman stays tall to punch a defensive shot to cover
full outside off stump, and he leans forward to play a smart-looking cover drive. Very Ganguly/Sangakkara-like. But stopped by the fielder
good length on off and angling in. Stands tall once again, and punches with the straight bat to mid on
good length on off, and going down the leg side. Comfortably pulled behind square along the ground, and the ball races away to the fine-leg boundary!
full toss on middle stump, and defended to wide long off for a single
full on middle stump, and smothered with the spin towards the leg side. Gentle hands with silly mid on looming
overpitched outside off, and he toe-ends a cover drive to Roach at deep point. Enough time to trod across for the run
full on middle, and skidding in. But Shadman carefully defends off the back foot to the leg side
full just outside off, and blocked off the front foot to the bowler
full just outside off, and driven towards cover with soft hands
good length on off, and he rides the bounce to defend off the back foot. Firmly played
full outside off, and he goes for an expansive cover drive. But the ball takes the inside edge and ricochets onto his pads!
good length on middle, and extra bounce forces Mominul to uncomfortably defend towards the leg side
full-ish outside off, and driven off the front foot to cover. Tentatively played to the off side

anticlimactic end to the session! Short outside off, and Mominul tries to flat-bat it over the leg side. Looks to pull, but it's come off the bat's top-half, and it's an easy lobbed catch to long on. Got carried away, and falls just one delivery before lunch. The Bangladesh coach will not be pleased!
full just outside off, and defended off the front foot to mid off. Just one ball in this over after lunch
full on off, and defended towards the leg side
full on off stump, and nudged away to the leg side
full on middle, and driven to cover
full on off and driven to cover once again.  Much expansive a drive on this occasion
full just outside off, and the right-handed Mithun pushes at this to cover
full on off, and driven off the bat's toe-end, but intercepted at cover
length ball angling in, and flicked off his hips to deep backward square
full just outside off, from over the wicket. Caresses a front-foot drive to mid off on this occasion
full on off and aimed at off stump. He plants his front foot in front of his body, and drives to mid off. But can't clear the fielder
back of a length delivery that's angling in, and fended off the back foot towards midwicket
length ball outside off, not full enough. But Mithun looks to drive anyway. Mistimed onto his body on this occasion
overpitched on middle, and driven past the bowler to mid on. Brathwaite drives across the ground, and parries the ball to mid off, as the batsman scamper across for a single
full on middle, and drilled to wide long off for a walking single
full outside off, and turning into the batsman. Fended away
full on off, and he reaches the delivery to push it towards cover. Firmly played
full outside off, and he winds up to crunch a cover drive. But mid off runs to his right, and dives to intercept, before it can clear the infield
good length on middle, and he rocks back to defend off the back foot. Gentle hands
full on middle, and driven down the ground to long off. They walk across for a single

length ball outside off, and he waits for the ball to come to him, before steering a square cut to the fielder at point. Roach's front-foot hasn't crossed the line but the umpire feels otherwise. Unlucky, WI!
length ball outside off, and cut off the back foot to point
good length on off, and angling inwards. Tiptoes to defend off the back foot
good length outside off, and cut off the back foot to point
full just outside off, and he comes forward to drive. Mistimes to the bowler
full outside off, and he plants his leg forward to drive. Mistimed to mid off
full on off, and he offers the bat's full face to defend. Takes the bat's outside edge, and runs down to point
full outside off, and punched to mid off
full outside off, and driven once again off the front foot. Can't pierce the infield though
full just outside off, and pushed away to cover off the front foot
full on middle, much tighter from Warrican. Fended off the front foot
full on off, and an expansive check-drive rolls away to Brathwaite at cover
full on off, and he shuffles across to push this delivery past short mid on to midwicket
back of a length on off, and he rides the bounce to pull. Mistimed to fine leg
back of a length from round the wicket, and he flat-bats a pull to the leg side. Slices it to midwicket
length ball outside off, and that's the first delivery i've seen today where the batsman has shouldered his arms. Through to the keeper
back of a length on middle, and he controls a pulled shot along the ground to deep midwicket. Two fielders in the deep there, hoping he plays the pull more aerially. But well played by the batsman
length ball angling in, and clipped off his hips to midwicket. Lateral movement this time
back of a length on off, and he sways away from the line of the ball. Sharply collected by the keeper
full outside off stump, and driven against the turn past Chase at point. He gives the ball, well, a 'chase', and intercepts from near the boundary
full on middle, and he defends this back to Warrican off the front foot
good length on off, and turning inwards. Rocks back onto the back foot, and punches to mid off
full on off, and angling further away. Makes some room, and mistimes a cover drive to the fielder near the circle
full on leg stump, and he clears his front leg to allow his bat to swing straight through. Driven to Warrican
overpitched outside leg, and he's down on one knee to try and sweep. The ball hits his front leg and rolls away to the leg side
back of a length on middle, and the batsman ducks under this innocuous delivery. Through to the keeper, on the bounce
back of a length outside off, and defended off the back foot
back of a length on off, and he check-pulls this along the ground to deep midwicket. Completely in control
length ball outside off, and he drops his gloves to steer this to third man
full outside off stump, and Shadman's happy to shoulder his arms. Through to the keeper
full outside off, and he crunches a cover drive through the infield. But a half-stop from Brathwaite ensures it won't get to the boundary. Beautiful looking shot, though. Oof
full outside off, and he's through the dive too early. Off the bat's top half, and rolling away to cover
length ball on off, and he backs away to caress the ball through to deep extra cover
full outside leg stump, and clipped off his pads to short fine leg. No chance of a run there
length ball on middle, and fended off the back foot to cover
full outside leg stump again, and tapped away to midwicket with soft hands
full outside leg, and he sweeps to get to his fifty! Well struck, and clearing square leg with ease. Mithun congratulates Shadman on his maiden debut half-century!
back of a length on off, and angling in. He rocks back, covers his off stump, and blocks off the back foot
good length outside off, and lateral movement brings the ball in. Defended off the front foot
full just outside off, and confidently driven through the off side. Off the bat's outside half though, so no real power generated
length ball on the fourth-stump line, and he confidently defends off the back foot on this occasion
low full toss, but can't put it away. Driven to Bishoo at forward point, and the his knee takes a knock! Hurting, but not too much
full on middle, and defended back to Lewis. Well stopped by the bowler, and he lines up to throw the ball back towards the batsman since he was out of the crease. Eventually chooses not to
full outside off, and spinning away. Driven to wide long off
back of a length on middle, and he makes room to slap a cut. Well hit, but fielder at deep point for that shot
full just outside off stump, and defended off the front foot to cover
good length on middle, and he uses the depth of the crease to defend off the back foot
full on leg stump, and he leans forward to defend with soft hands
full on off, and pushed with soft hands into the vacant point region. They scurry across for a single
tossed up outside off, and he crunches a drive through the covers. Has four written all over it, but deep extra cover runs across the boundary to intercept
flighted outside off, and pushed away to deep extra cover
full on off, and but spinning into his pads. Tries to nudge it towards the leg side, and does so with ease
full on middle, and tapped away off his pads to the leg side. Short leg lurking
full on off, and he offers the bat's full face to drive to long on. They jog across for a single
good length on off, and defended off the back foot
full on middle, and pushed with the straight bat back to Bishoo
length ball on middle, and defended
full on middle, and steered away for a single
length ball skidding in, and flicked off his hips rather smartly to deep backward square
full on off, and defended to cover
length ball outside off, and slapped away to deep point for a trodding single. He'll keep strike
length ball on middle, and he goes back to punch towards midwicket. Through short leg's legs!
full on off stump, and driven to wide long off
full outside off, and driven to cover off the front foot
full just outside off, and defended back to Chase
comes down the track to this flighted delivery and drives it down to long-off
length ball on middle, and defended against the spin to mid on. Enough time to pinch a single
full just outside off, and defended away to cover off the front foot
full outside off, and he smothers it with the spin to cover
full outside off stump, and he takes a big stride to the pitch of the ball to defend
turn and bounce! Full outside off, and leaps off the surface. Shadman shouldered his arms, but he needs to be careful where his stumps are
good length on off, and fended off the back foot to mid on
full just outside off, and fended off the front foot to the off side
good length on off, and spinning inwards. Tapped off the back foot to the leg side
good length on off, and punched with the bat's closed face to wide long on. Enough time to walk across for one
length ball on off stump, and punched down to long off
full on leg, and sharp turn takes the ball down the leg side. Good take by the keeper
pulls well, but a diving effort from Lewis stops the boundary. Length ball angling in, and he really thumped this behind square off the back foot
flighted on the stumps, but too full, and he clips it from outside off to long-on
leg-break pitched on middle and turning away, steered to point
drags it a bit short, allowing him to stay in his crease and punch to deep cover
very full again outside off, and he drives it to long-on for an easy single
flatter on off, defended back
drifts on the pads and tapped into the leg side
better length, good flight, drawing him forward to defend
too full outside off, and drives it square by opening the face of the bat to deep point
back of a length, spinning from off to leg, he goes back in his crease and uses his wrists to turn it round the corner to fine leg. Fifty partnership between the two
tossed up generously, too full and he unleashes a full-blooded drive. However, there is a deep cover

half-hearted appeal. Better ball, pitching on a length and spinning into the right-hander, who had taken a big stride forward but couldn't reach the pitch of the ball. The ball popped off the pad to short leg
patted back to the bowler
tossed up outside off, and driven to extra cover
stays back and steers it to short third man
flatter on the stumps and a bit short, transfers weight back and cuts it to the man at deep point
full ball given air, driven to the bowler's left
good length, drawing him forward to defend
length ball defended into the off side
length ball on the stumps, defended
good length on the stumps, he's happy to defend those
dragged it a bit short, spinning away from the left hander and bouncing, he stays back and cuts it to deep point
length ball on the stumps, spinning onto the pads, he taps it down
still getting some turn, but he's allowing the batsman to pick him off easily. Goes back and turns it round the corner with the spin
beaten on the cut wasn't quite close enough, and he tried to give himself room but it skidded through
good length, comes forward to defend
tossed up but too full, he takes a step forward and clips it back to the bowler
that's a better length, drawing him forward but not to the pitch of the ball, he still gets the toe-end of the bat to it, driving it to mid-off
down the track, gets to the pitch of the ball and drives it to long-on
too short, outside off and spinning away, he slaps it with power, but the man at point dives to his left to save runs
length ball, comes forward to defend
too full, but the drift carries to the pads, he gets his bat in front and shows the full face, driving to mid-on
another trouble-free forward defense
shot tossed up on off, and he comes nonchalantly forward and drives it through cover and to the fence

cleaned him up The third wicket to fall off a bad shot. Went for a pull, but this was too full and it was the googly. Completely missed it, but the ball doesn't miss the stumps. Wicket out of nowhere almost, which has been the case for all three batsmen to fall today. West Indies might feel a spark of hope again now
appreciable turn into the left-hander. Pitched on a good length, and turned past his bat to hit him on pad
big turn again, Shakib stays in his crease and defends
similar ball, defended from deep inside the crease
too full, and Shakib drives it down to long-on to get off the mark
flatter, slider. Zoots through but Shadman is quick to bring his bat down and block it
back of a length, moving away from the batsman and squares him up. but Shakib able to open his bat face and steer it away
went with the angle that time, from around the wicket. Same spot, back of a length, but ends up on the pads and he can clip it to fine leg
good length outside off, defended to cover
back of a length, coming into the batsman, who defends from the crease
length ball on the stumps, tapped to mid-on with an angled bat
back of a length outside off, that kept a bit low, but the line meant he was in position to punch it through cover. He adjusted well to bend lower and execute the shot
stays back to this fuller one and is almost caught on the crease. Manages to get his bat down to keep it out
length ball on middle and off, spinning away. Allows Shakib to tuck it to fine leg
flighted and fuller, turning into Shakib, who continues to stay back. Goes deep in his crease to punch to mid-on
googly, but too short and wide outside off, he hangs on his back foot and he's able to slash it away for four. He's also overstepped so no-ball

trapped in front! no debut century for Shadman bowled from round the wicket, and he plays down the wrong line, he thought it would turn more. It sneaks past his outside edge, holds its line and hits pad. It would have gone on to hit the stumps. End of a very good innings on debut.
turned into the leg side
back of a length outside off, seemed to hold up on the pitch. Shakib waited and steered it to gully
back of a length, not rising above the pads. Angling into him and he tucks it to mid-on
bouncer outside off, but Shakib is able to get on top of it and slap it to deep point
back of a length, angling into the right-hander from over the wicket. Defended from the crease
full ball outside off, Shakib opens the face and steers it to third man. Executed with finesse
big turn pitched on a length outside off and ends up on his pads
nails the sweep full enough to execute and he goes down immediately and swats it hard to deep midwicket
on a length outside off and spinning into him considerably, he waits for it and taps it towards point
good length, on the stumps and spinning away, he gets right behind it and defends
too full, driven past extra cover to get off the mark
back of a length outside off, he stays beside the line and punches it past point
back of a length outside off to the left-hander now, and Shakib nudges it past cover
varies his length, goes fuller. Mushfiqur transfers weight in time to defend it from the crease
returns to his back of length delivery outside off, and Mushfiqur gets on his toes to punch it to cover

brilliantly caught - or is it? Shakib was too early into the shot and it popped up back to Roach, who dived forward and caught the ball. Shakib is staying put though. And now we see why. The ball bounced just before he got it Difficult for the fielder to know the ball has bounced in these cases. The ball was dying on Roach, and he was diving forward and to his right.
on the pads and tapped into the leg side
tossed up generously, but he doesn't give in to the temptation to swat it. Just pats it away
beaten gets his loop right immediately and slides it across the right hander. Arm ball went with the line, but he played inside the line
too short, and he rocks back to pull it to square leg
tossed up again, very slow through the air. 67kph. Defended
given air outside off, Shakib is taking no chances. Defends into the off side
very loopy and wide outside off, Shakib comes forward to drive it to the man at deep cover
strays down leg first ball, past the pads
very full on the stumps, driven back past the bowler
good length, nipping back in. He manages to chop it down to gully
yorker length ball, dug back out to the bowler.
length ball, seaming back in but not far enough. He covers the line and lets it go through
fuller outside off, he comes forward to push it to cover
tossed up on off, but Mushfiqur reads it well, stays back and low and steers it down to third man
narrowly missed went for the sweep, got an under-edge and the ball rolled past off stump. Close call
good flight, makes him come forward to defend
back of a length and he stays back to cut it through point. Mushfiqur has become only the second Bangladesh batsmen with 4000 runs in Tests Full list
stays back to defend
given air outside off, he comes forward to work this to long-on
back of a length, but keeps the line on the stumps. Defended to cover off the back foot
keeps it straight and slightly short of a length. Blocked
goes fuller that time, driven firmly off the front foot but straight to mid-on
returns to back of length, defended off the back foot to gully
length ball on off, not quite in driving range. Gets the end of the bat to mid-off
fuller length outside off again, driven firmly again, but straight to extra cover
waits for it and steers it to third man with a late cut. Finesse
lets it go through, he read that it wasn't the googly so wouldn't be spinning back
too full and he goes down to sweep it, to midwicket
slightly back of a length, spinning away, and cut with the spin to deep point
comes down the track, but the bowler adjust by going flatter. Patted into the leg side
too short again, stays back and whips it to deep square leg
flicked to fine leg
back of a length outside off, the ball didn't rise much. pushed past cover
cleaned him up Full, quick and swinging back in. Goes completely through Mushfiqur and makes a mess of his stumps. Great ball, deserved a wicket. West Indies still fighting
back of a length outside off, he hung his bat out at that, goes of the toe end past point
inside edge Coming into the batsman from round the wicket and Shakib looked tentative, the ball takes the inside edge and goes to fine leg
outside off on a length, pushed tamely toward gully, who makes a diving stop
nicely bowled, on a good length and has Shakib going back to defend it
fired in quicker and flatter, he defends off the front foot
flatter outside off, getting some turn still, Shakib plays with the turn to push to point
tossed up on off, allows him to drive through cover
tossed up on a good length, comes forward to turn it to midwicket
tossed up, too full. Driven to wide long-on
squared him up Straightened appreciably after pitching, he was expecting to play it on leg stump, it takes the outside edge and flies away. Point puts in a dive to stop the ball
patted back towards mid-off
too close to cut, and not really that short. Shakib still manages to cut it, but the man at gully dives and stops the ball
bouncer  but  down leg, Shakib went for the pull but didn't connect. Half-hearted appeal from the keeper, but no one else joined in
well fielded by cover driven on the up to cover, got his body behind it and the ball bounced off his left shin to mid-off. He's getting some treatment now
bouncer outside off, he swats it down to deep cover, riding the bounce
tossed up on off, driven to cover
outside edge gets it on the right length, getting Shakib forward and taking the thick edge with his spin, goes down to third man
comes forward to defend
fuller, tossed up. tapped back to the bowler
flatter on off, brings him forward and he ends up pushing it to cover
strays on the pads with this quicker one, and he's picked off down to fine leg
back of a length outside off, opens the face to steer it to third man
length ball outside off, tries to punch it with a flat bat, but ends up getting only the toe end
back of a length, angling into the body, tucked watchfully into the leg side
shorter still, angling into the ribcage. Swivels round to hook towards long leg, rolling his wrists over to keep the ball down
tossed up on the stumps, driven to mid-off
skidded through, he stays back to punch it
outside off and cut to point
tossed up, but he comes forward to the pitch of the ball and drives it fluently to deep cover
tossed up, he comes down the wicket and pats it to long-on
overthrows fuller ball steered to point. He dives and saves but the throw back is sloppy and mid-on has to run back to collect it
length ball outside off, not rising very much. Blocked to cover
strays on the pads, and is turned to fine leg
very straight, he flicks it from middle stump, but there is a midwicket who stops it
given room outside off and he leans into a nice looking cover drive
coming back into him, defended towards midwicket
opens the face of the bat to steer it to third man
beaten on a great length, draws him forward and spins past the bat
room outside off and too full, which lets him free his arms and slap it through cover
length ball on off, patted back to the bowler
tossed up, draws him forward, and the ball grips and turns, takes the inside edge and rolls down to fine leg
flatter on leg, and hits him the pads. Hawkeye shows it would have hit leg
good length on off, defended off the front foot
close to the off stump pitches on a length outside off and comes back in sharply. He shouldered arms, but that was a risky move, with the ball travelling very close to off stumps
good length, coming back in again takes his inside edge on to pad off the forward defense
back of a length, this one stays with the angle into the batsman. Bounces more than he thought and hits him below the chest, beating the intended pull
comes forward to push that through cover and get off strike
too full and on the pads, flicked to mid-on's left for a single
spin right after the break. Length ball turning away as Shakib rocks back and shoulders his arms
full toss on off stump, and driven to cover off the front foot
length ball outside off, and grips inwards after hitting the deck. Tries to defend off the back foot, but the ball hits his body and rolls onto his pads
length ball outside off, and punched off the back foot towards the non-striker
full on off stump, and he carefully nudges this with the turn to deep square leg
full outside off, and Shakib check-drives to cover to see the over out. Good spell from Chase, this
full outside off stump, and driven with the angled bat to backward point. Flies through the infield on this occasion
length ball on off, but tailing inwards very sharply! Shakib stands tall, and blocks off the back foot with the bat's full face
shot but stopped at wide mid off. Full outside off, and he caresses a beautiful front-foot drive. Just not placed well enough
length ball angling into Shakib's body, and he taps it off his hips to square leg. He's halfway down the pitch for a run, but Mahmudullah sends him back
full and wide outside off stump. Shakib opens the bat's face and shovels a square drive to deep point
good length outside off stump, and he shoulders his arms to let the ball go through
full on leg stump, and driven inside-out to wide long off. Enough time to walk across for one
full on off, and Mahmudullah sees the ball under his eyes, before turning it off his pads to short leg
tossed up on off, and he whips an on-drive to the leg side. Diving effort from short midwicket plugs the single
full outside off stump, and turning into the batsman. Defended down the ground to mid on
full just outside off, and tapped down the ground - past the non-striker - to long off
full outside off stump, and driven away from his body to deep backward point
full outside off, and turning into the left-hander. Defended off the back foot to point. Almost a front-foot no ball
full on off stump, and he muscles a straight drive - with the turn - to long off. Mistimed
full just outside off, and pushed off the front foot to cover
almost a yorker, drifting into off stump. Defended back to Bishoo
Mahmudullah uses his feet, but Bishoo goes short. Cat-and-mouse stuff. Mahmdullah checks his movement, and defends it back to Bishoo eventually
full just outside off stump, and pushed back to the bowler
back of a length on middle and Mahmudullah rocks back to heave a pull past the fielder at square leg! Cracking shot
good length outside off, and turning into Shakib's pads. Flicked to midwicket
length ball spinning inwards, and nudged off his pads to the leg side once more
length ball staying low, but turning into Shakib's pads. Defended with the angled bat to cover
tossed up on middle, and he walks into a straight drive to long on
length ball just outside off, and pushed off the back foot
full just outside off, and mistimed back to Warrican off the front foot
length ball on off, but spinning in sharply. Shakib makes room to cut, but it's too close to his body anyway. Somehow manages to splice the shot towards point
full just outside off, and spinning away after hitting the deck. Tries to drive, but the ball whizzes past his outside edge
length ball outside off, that turns away after hitting the deck. Mahmudullah lets it go
full on off, and Mahmudullah paddle sweeps after exposing his leg stump. Chase for short fine leg
length ball on off, and skidding through. Defended off the back foot to cover
good length outside off, and he cuts off the back foot to point
full just outside off, and defended against the turn, back to the bowler
arm ball, flatter on off and going through straight. Defended off the back foot on this occasion
full just outside off stump, and he looks to heave this towards the leg side. But the shot takes the inside edge onto his pads
full on off, and muscled down the ground to long on
full outside off stump, and the front-foot defense takes the outside edge to short third man
full just outside off stump, and Shakib gets to the pitch of the ball to drive to long on
full on off, and skidding into his pads. Well negated, by working it towards the leg side
length ball outside off, and he backs away to cut. But misses
length ball outside off stump, and cut off the back foot to point
full on off, and he sweeps behind square rather comfortably. Warrican cleans up near the boundary
length ball outside off stump, and the ball turns away from the batsman after hitting the deck. Cut in front of square to point
length ball outside off stump, and that turns sharply into his body. Uncomfortably nudged off his hips to the leg side

leading edge falls safely towards point. Length ball on middle, and gripping after hitting the deck. Tries to nudge it towards the leg side, but the bat's face has closed too early, and therefore taken the edge. Shakib will feel lucky. Fifty partnership too
full just outside off, and this time Shakib is more careful. Defended
full just outside off, and defended firmly - with the spin - to short mid on
full just outside off, and defended off the front foot to Warrican
good length outside off, and he dabs a late cut through the fielder at slip! He's coming back for the third run and that's Shakib's 24th Test fifty
good length outside off stump, and punched off the back foot to cover
length ball on middle, and worked off his hips to backward square leg
full on off stump, and defended off the front foot to cover
length ball outside off, but the ball turns away after pitching. Mahmudullah makes room and cuts behind square to point
length ball on middle, and nudged off the back foot to square leg with gentle hands. They jog across for a single
length ball outside off, and wild legbreak from Bishoo allows Mahmudullah to free his arms. Mistimes the cut to point eventually
length ball outside off, and slapped off the back foot to deep point once again. They walk across for a single
length ball outside off stump, and cut away behind square to deep backward point. Calls nice and early for the second run

full outside off, and he skips down the ground to clip this off his pads to deep midwicket. Once again, Mahmdullah calls for the double early, and this time he's famished! Asks the dugout for a drink after completing the second
full outside off stump, and defended off the front foot to point with the angled bat
length ball outside off, and he backs away to carve this off the back foot to deep point
full on off stump, and tapped off the front foot towards the leg side. Soft hands
overpitched on middle, and drilled down the ground to long on for a walking single. He'll keep strike
full on off stump, no real spin. Defended towards the off side as the bowler intercepts running to his right
slow and full outside off stump. Shakib backs away and punches to cover with soft hands
length ball going down leg, but Shakib taps it away nonetheless. Stopped by midwicket
full on off, and he drills a straight drive past mid off to the fielder in the deep. Roach cleans up
length ball outside off, and carved off the back foot to point
good length outside off, and punched firmly off the back foot to mid off
good length outside off, and that's been punched off the back foot past the silly point fielder who tries to protect himself. Work for deep extra cover
full just outside off stump, and defended off the back foot. Ensures the ball remains on the ground
full outside off, and spinning into the batsman. Nudged away to the leg side
full on off stump, and he smothers the spin towards midwicket. Comfortably driven
good length on middle, and dabbed down the leg side off his pads. Stopped by short fine leg
length ball outside off, but turning in sharply. Shakib was looking to cut, but chooses to tap it away after seeing the ball come into his body
full on middle stump from round the wicket. Defended straight back to Kraigg
full on middle stump, and defended back towards the off side
full on leg stump, and he clears his front leg to drill a drive down to long on
full just outside off stump, and defended towards the leg side
good length on off, and turning inwards. Fended with soft hands towards the leg side
full outside off stump, and nudged away to the leg side
coming round the wicket, and this zips away from the surface. Length ball outside off, and it takes a puff of dust after hitting the deck. Shakib fishes outside off, but the ball goes past his bat
length ball on off, and Shakib covers his off stump to defend off the back foot
fuller, but not full enough. On off stump, and Shakib shuffles backwards to fend it away to cover
length ball outside off, and Shakib stands tall before punching a back-foot drive through the covers! Nobody in the infield even bothered to move
full just outside off, and he steers a defensive shot to point. Soft hands on this occasion
length ball on off, and extra bounce hits Shakib near the bat's handle. The ball flies away towards the leg side in a safe manner
full and wide outside off, and Shakib is enticed to go for the big one. Looks to lift it over mid off, but the ball takes the outside edge and flies over short third man instead! Lucky
full outside off, and pushed with the spin to deep extra cover. They jog across for one
full outside off stump, and he defends with soft hands towards the vacant point region
full, and very wide outside off stump. Spinning further away too, and Shakib chooses not to engage
length ball on off stump, and angling into Shakib this time. Fended off the back foot
full outside off, and driven against the turn to wide long off for a single

beauty! Full and fast on off stump, and once again the ball jags away after hitting the deck. Shakib's on the back foot and trying to defend, but the delivery has whizzed past his outside edge once more
length ball on off stump, and Shakib leans forward to defend the ball back to Roach
back of a length on off, and angling into his body. Shakib tries to nudge it away off his hips, but the ball hits his thigh guard and rolls away towards the on-side. They scamper across for a run

is that out? The second-slip fielder celebrates but nobody else really knows. Umpire Palliyaguruge says soft signal is not out. It was a length ball outside off, and Mahmudullah looks to defend off the back foot. But the ball moves away from him, takes the outside edge and then goes low to Hetmyer in the slips. He's taken the catch really close to the ground, so the question is whether the ball hit the grass first. The TV umpire is looking at multiple replays, some even zoomed in. He says 'I can't tell for sure whether it's ground first or finger first', so the decision of the on-field umpire stays! My my, this is interesting! It was very touch-and-go, and if the umpire's soft signal was out... then Mahmudullah would've had to go
back of a length outside off, and he's happy to shoulder his arms on this occasion

full outside off stump, and he sticks his bat's angled face open towards point. A hard ping off the bat, and the cherry races across the ground with point chasing it. Enough time to take the second run
full on off, and turning away after hitting the surface. Shakib shapes up to punch this off the back foot, but the ball goes past his bat
full outside off, and he's down on one knee to sweep aggressively in front of square. But the ball has hit short leg right on his elbow, and saves a certain boundary for West Indies
full just outside off, and defended off the front foot to cover
full on off, and he goes to slog-sweep once again. This time it's been hit over short leg, and the fielder at deep backward square is too fine!
full on off stump, and that's a carbon copy of the last shot. Down on one knee, and sweeping this in front of square with disdain. Short leg fielder took cover even before Shakib played that shot
full on off, and this time Shakib paddles this fine past the vacant fine-leg region for a hat-trick of boundaries! What an over. The last two shots were power, this one was all class
full on off, and defended away
full outside off, and he looks to play an expansive cover drive. But mistimed towards the off side

back of a length on off stump, but angling into Mahmudullah's body. He tries to whip it away off his hips to the leg side, but the ball hits his front leg. Roach appeals for lbw, not given by the umpire and therefore West Indies review! Replays show Mahmudullah's feet are in the air, and it's hit him above the knee roll. The ball is clipping the top of leg stump, but it's determined as umpire's call! So Mahmudullah survives another close one
length ball outside off, and he looks to defend from near his body. Inside-edged through his body to the leg side
length ball outside off, and tailing in sharply after hitting the deck. Mahmudullah looks to defend off the front foot, but the ball has flown past his outside edge
length ball angling in, and this time Mahmudullah has flicked this fine down the leg side, with no fine leg in place!
full on off stump, and Shakib toe-ends a defensive shot back to Bishoo
yorker on off stump, and Shakib backs away to drive through the covers. But it's in the blockhole, so Shakib does well to shovel this ball away
length ball outside off, and turning into Shakib. Backs away to make some room, and cuts behind square to deep point
full outside off stump, and he drills a straight drive to mid off. Diving effort from the infielder saves the boundary
flatter from Bishoo, and that's been put away! Mahmudullah uses the depth of the crease, and then pulls in front of square for another four!
full just outside off stump, and defended off the front foot to point
length ball on off, and clipped off his pads behind square to the fielder in the deep. A sharp effort from the fielder forces the batsmen to reconsider the second run
length ball, wide outside off, and Mahmudullah skips down the wicket to flat-bat a lifted slapshot right over cover! Where did that come from?!
length ball outside off, and he stands tall to punch a square drive off the back foot. But straight to the fielder
length ball on off stump, and defended off the back foot towards the leg side
edged to gully! Not full enough, not close enough and Shakib looks to drive nonetheless. Takes the bat's outside edge and flies to the fielder next to the slip cordon. Silence engulfs the ground
back of a length on middle, but going down the leg side. Liton Das does nothing for his first delivery of the Test

full on middle stump, and the ball stays low! Tries to nudge it towards the leg side, but the ball hits his front leg. Big appeal for lbw from Lewis, but not given by the umpire. West Indies review. Impact's outside leg stump, though, so this is definitely missing the stumps. The visitors lose their review. Top decision from umpire Aleem Dar
back of a length outside off, and he tiptoes to defend off the back foot
back of a length outside off, and he's slapped a cut shot to Bishoo at deep point
back of a length outside off stump once again. Shapes up to cut square, but bottom-edges it towards the off side
full on leg stump, and Liton lets it go through to the keeper. Ball going down leg
length ball on off, and he covers his stumps to defend off the back foot
length ball on off, angling in. Flicked off his pads to the leg side
full on middle stump, and Mahmudullah nurdles this fine to fine leg
length ball on middle, but swerving down the leg side
length ball on off stump, and defended off the back foot
full outside off stump, and pushed away from his body to cover
full outside off stump, and he blocks with soft hands towards point to see the over out
length ball outside off, and he looks to defend off the front foot. Extra bounce hits the top of his back leg, but the lbw appeal is muted
length ball outside off stump, and defended off the back foot towards the off side
length ball outside off, and steered off the back foot to point. Moves to 49
full on middle stump, and he plays an exquisite on-drive through midwicket! Allows the ball to come to him, and gently pushes it away into the vacant leg-side region
full on leg stump, and he looks to whip this away behind square. Misses
full on off, and defended back to Warrican
full just outside off again, and blocked back with soft hands
full on middle stump, and fended away towards the off side
full just outside off stump, and pushed past Warrican's left to long off. He walks across to the other side to collect another Test half-century!
full just outside off, and defended towards the off side
length ball on off stump, and defended off the back foot
length ball outside off, and whizzing through to the keeper, with the batsman looking to fish outside off stump
length ball on off, and he swivels to pull behind square. Man in the deep though
length ball outside off, and he punches this off the back foot to cover
back of a length outside off, and defended off the back foot towards point
full just outside off, and driven down the ground. But the bowler sticks his left hand out and intercepts
full on leg stump, and clipped off his boots to the leg side. Stopped by midwicket. Drinks
full just outside off stump, and pushed away from his body to wide long off
full just outside off, and defended away to cover
full on off, and that's been swept behind square to deep backward square. The fielder in the deep puts no half measures in putting in a diving effort
full on off, but he skips down the ground to work this towards the leg side. Beats the fielder at midwicket, and the ball races away to the boundary

full on leg stump, and tries to whip it away towards the leg side. But the ball goes under his bat, hits his front leg, and rolls away to silly point. The fielder has a shy at the stumps, but he can't get a direct hit
full and wide outside off, and caressed through the covers to deep extra cover
full on leg stump, and clipped off his boots to the leg side. But a diving stop at midwicket saves a boundary
steered away past point off the back foot. Bishoo gives it a chase, and he does some nifty footwork to save the boundary at third man
length ball just outside off, and he leans forward to block it away towards mid off
length ball just outside off, and angling into middle stump. Mahmudullah stands tall to block
length ball just outside off stump, and blocked comfortably off the back foot to mid off
full just outside off, and he defends with soft hands towards the off side. Sees the over out with ease
full on middle stump, and swept square to beat the fielder in the deep! In position early, still head on his shoulders, and absolutely clattered into the boundary
length ball outside off, and he shapes up to cut square. Ball stays low, but still a solid contact to point
full just outside off, and Liton sweeps once again to pierce the two leg-side fielders in the deep! Precise from Liton
full just outside off stump, and defended with soft hands towards the off side
full just outside off, and he backs away to drive inside-out through the covers. Well hit, but mid off does well to intercept
good length outside off, and carved off the back foot to deep point
full on off stump, and he takes a big stride forward to check-drive down the ground. Stopped at mid off
length ball outside off, and defended with soft hands towards the off side
back of a length outside off, and carved off the back foot to deep point
good length outside off, and he dabs this shot from near the body to try and beat short third man. But he finds the fielder instead
length ball outside off, and wide enough for Liton to free his arms. Cuts under the ball, and the shot flies off his bat into the point boundary. Delight for the fans
length ball on off. Stump-to-stump bowling but Liton defends with the bat's open face to point for a walking single
full on off, and turning away from the right hander. Nurdled away to point off the front foot
length ball on off, and Mahmudullah rocks back to defend off the back foot
length ball outside off, and spinning further away. Makes room and cuts in front of square to deep extra cover
length ball outside off, and he makes room to carve this away past the infielders on the off side for a single
flatter on off, and he flat-bats a pull towards the wide long-on boundary! Liton uses his strong bottom hand to steer this shot in front of square and not behind. Earns full rewards for that shot
beautiful ball! Full on off, and spinning just past Liton's outside edge and into the keeper's gloves
full just outside off, and he drives inside the line of the ball. Hits the bat's inside-half and lobs into the air. But it drops safely just in front of Roach's followthrough
full on middle, and nudged away off his toes to the right of mid on
full just outside off, and defended towards point. A breezy half-century partnership!
full on middle, and nudged off his toes to the leg side. Soft hands
full on leg stump, as the ball hits his front leg and rolls towards the keeper's left
full on off stump, and he takes a small stride forward to defend it back towards the bowler
length ball outside off, and punched off the back foot to deep extra cover
length ball outside off, and slapped in front of square off the back foot
good length outside off, and cut off the back foot. Finds point this time
tossed up on middle, and defended towards the vacant cover region for a walking single
length ball on middle stump, and he defends it with the turn, off his back foot
length ball outside off, and cut with the spin. But one-bounce to point
full just outside off, and he blocks off the front foot with soft hands. The ball rolls back to Roach
length ball outside off stump, and dabbed off the back foot to short third man. But Shai Hope throws himself into the ground, and manages to pull off an athletic stop
back of a length outside off, and he defends off the back foot this time. The ball flies towards gully once more, and another diving effort from Hope stops the ball from going past
length ball on middle stump, and blocked after shuffling across the stumps to get inside the line of the delivery
full just outside off stump, and pushed off the front foot to wide mid off. Wants the single, but can't take it
full ball angling in, and he smothers this away to the leg side with gentle hands
length ball just outside off, and Liton allows the ball to spin away from him and into the keeper's gloves
full on off stump, and he takes a big stride forward to block off the front foot
length ball outside off, and he flat-bats a pull shot to wide long on! Again, strong bottom hand ensuring the shot was always played in front of square
full on off stump, and awkwardly defended away to point. Kept his eyes on the ball at all times to negate the spin
full on middle, and defended away to cover off the front foot
tossed up outside off, and he pads the ball away to the slip cordon. Bishoo appeals lbw hoping that the impact was within the stumps, but it's unlikely
full just outside off stump, and defended away to cover
full on leg stump from round the wicket. Tapped back to the bowler
full on leg stump, and turned away towards the leg side from near his pads
full on middle, and swept behind square. But the timing isn't good, and so the man at deep backward square has enough time to cut this across
full just outside off stump. Defended away to point off the front foot
full outside leg stump, and clipped off his pads to the vacant square-leg region
full on middle stump, and driven towards the leg side to cow corner. Wide, open spaces
full on middle stump, and defended towards cover
length ball just outside off stump, and cut off the back foot to deep point
length ball outside off, and he carves a late cut through the fielder at short third man!
full just outside off stump, and defended with soft hands towards point
length ball on off, and he waits for the ball to come to him, before punching in front of square to deep extra cover
full on off stump, and drilled down the ground to long on for a walking single

full on off, and he walks down the ground to deposit a shot right over deep midwicket! Going for a six, and that's hit the advertising skirting on the full. Yep, half-a-dozen. Great wristwork from Liton there
full on middle stump, and worked away to the leg side
tossed up outside off, and that's been drilled through the covers for an exquisite cover drive. What a way to bring up your Test fifty! Going at a strike-rate of over 100
full on middle, and nudged away towards the leg side for two more. Work for deep midwicket
